assignments.description: This step increases the eventCounter by 1 and sets "Calendly Scheduling Widget" to false. A step later in the flow, relies on the scheduling widget to be true and we're resetting it here, for when a user creates multiple events in the same flow, to make sure they don't scoot past the "scheduling widget check" later on.
assignments.name: Increment_Event_Counter_and_Reset_Scheduling_Widget
assignments.label: Increment Event Counter and Reset Scheduling Widget

formulas.name: frmIsCompanyLecture
formulas.expression: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL({!Get_Account.Host_Type__c}, "Company"), ISPICKVAL({!Get_Account.Host_Type__c}, "Association") ), true, false )

formulas.name: frmKampagnebudskab
formulas.expression: CASE({!Get_Account.Market_Unit__c}, "DFJ_DK", "Gratis foredrag om arv og testamente, inkl. middag p " & {!Get_Account.Name}, "FA_SE", "Gratis frelsning om arv & testamente. F svar p hur du skrar dig och din familj vid sjukdom och ddsfall.", "Other Value" /* Default value if none of the above conditions are met */ )

formulas.name: frmTodayPlus2BusinessDays

fields.name: displayCustomError
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong...


Error message:

{!CustomError}

fields.name: displayIntroText
fields.fieldText: Book an event with {!Get_Account.Name}!

fields.name: displayS1HostInfo
fields.fieldText: About {!Get_Account.Name}

fields.name: headerScreen2
fields.fieldText: How Many Events are you Creating?

fields.name: numberOfEventsToCreate
fields.fieldText: How Many Events are you Creating?

fields.name: S3_Header
fields.fieldText: You are now creating event {!CreateEventCounter} of {!numberOfEventsToCreate}!

fields.name: S3NumCapacity
fields.helpText: Enter the amount of seats available at the location

fields.name: displayExcludingVatAlert
fields.fieldText: INPUT AMOUNTS EXCL. VAT

screens.name: Screen_4_How_To_Decide_on_Lecturer
screens.label: Screen 4 - How To Decide on Lecturer

fields.name: S3HeaderHowToDecideLecturer
fields.fieldText: How do you want to set the Lecturer?

fields.name: S4displayToSelectLecturerDescr
fields.fieldText: When setting a lecturer, you have two options:

fields.name: displayDesignatedLecturerNotice
fields.fieldText:
A Designated Lecturer is set on the Host

Because of this, that Lecturer is automatically selected and you cannot change this.

To select a different Lecturer, you must remove the Designated Lecturer from the Host.

fields.name: displaySkippedBookingAlert
fields.fieldText: Please remember to finalize the booking before proceeding to the next screen

fields.name: displayPleaseCompleteBooking
fields.fieldText: Please complete the booking above, before attempting to proceed.

fields.name: displaySuccessWaitForRedirect
fields.fieldText:
Event {!CreateEventCounter} of {!numberOfEventsToCreate} Created Successfully


Start: {!Get_Calendly_Action.Calendly__EventStartTime__c}

End: {!Get_Calendly_Action.Calendly__EventEndTime__c}

Lecturer: {!Get_Calendly_Action.Calendly__EventPrimaryPublisherName__c}

Event ID: {!EventId}

fields.name: headerScreen6
fields.fieldText:
Event not found


After booking an event through Calendly, it takes a few seconds for it to appear in Salesforce.


We searched for it, but didn't find it yet.


Wait a few seconds and try again.

fields.name: displayNoEmailsAlert
fields.fieldText:
Send Email Later


When choosing to send emails later, the Opportunity will be updated to "Negotiation" instead.

Once you send the confirmation emails, it will automatically update to "Awaiting Confirmation"

fields.name: displayFinalHeader
fields.fieldText: Thank you!

fields.name: displayFinalEventsCreatedEmailsSent
fields.fieldText: The event(s) have been created and you've sent {!EmailCounter} emails.

fields.name: displayFinalEventsCreatedNoEmails
fields.fieldText:
The event(s) have been created.

You've marked that you will send the confirmation emails later.

fields.name: headerScreen2Draft
fields.fieldText:
Proof-read Draft Email


Below you see the auto-generated draft email.

Feel free to make adjustments, before sending it out.

fields.name: displayPromoOnNextPageInfo
fields.fieldText: OBS: After sending this email, you will be prompted to also proof-read the promotional email

fields.name: headerScreen2DraftPromo
fields.fieldText:
Proof-read Promotional Email


Below you see the auto-generated promotional email draft.

Feel free to make adjustments, before sending it out.

textTemplates.name: ErrorMsgInvalidLecturerWasSelected
textTemplates.text:
No Active User Found


The Event has been booked for

Name: {!Get_Calendly_Action.Calendly__EventPrimaryPublisherName__c}

Email: {!Get_Calendly_Action.Calendly__EventPrimaryPublisherEmail__c}


We did not find an active Salesforce user, matching that information.

textTemplates.name: ErrorMsgInvalidZipCode
textTemplates.text:
Something's wrong. We are trying to check Zip Code, to determine which Lecturer to pick.



Give this information to your administrator:


Flow: Screen Flow: Lecture Booking/Reservation

Zip Code: {!Get_Account.BillingPostalCode}

Zip Variable (number): {!varZipCode}

textTemplates.name: ErrorMsgMissingLecturerBookingLink
textTemplates.text:
Booking Link is Missing


You selected the user {!NameOfLecturer}.

For a lecturer to be selectable, they must have their own booking- and resveration links.


The booking link for {!NameOfLecturer} seems to be empty.


The IT department has already been notified.


How to proceed:


You have three options:

  1. Select another lecturer
  2. Allow the system to automatically select a new lecturer
  3. Wait for IT to respond to you that you can now select this lecturer

textTemplates.name: txtContactInformation
